english.segment1: Behold a valley filled with bones. Bones on every side. A valley flush, a floor so full. Of bones so very dry
english.segment2: The Lord did ask, Can these bones live?. Might these bones rise once more?. What else was I to say but you alone can tell O, Lord.
english.segment3: A legion I will rise. A resurrected army. A living holy host of a people born again
english.segment4: Then prophesy O son of man. Cry out to this dead hord. And when they come to life again. They'll know I am The Lord
english.segment5: And when I spoke what I was told. There came a rattling sound. As bone to bone they formed a mass of bodies on the ground
english.segment6: The dead will come alive. Their graves will lie abandoned. And all who dwelleth in the dust will wake and shout for joy
